name: Cloud Stacks
body:
### Cloud Stacks
Cloud stacks are scripts for quick and easy deployments of open source tools on cloud platforms.

Currently the following stacks are planned for deployment on VMs on AWS.

* ELK from elastic

### Contact
If you have any issues deploying this stack do get in touch with me @cloudstacks.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
